languages.text: "Узор их душ изувечен — я узнаю в них присущие Кибелле оттенки, но они будто вписаны туда жестокой и грубой рукой. Две из них — подделки, но они... будто не понимают этого". {n}Черные вены вздуваются на висках Кассии, и она со стоном обхватывает голову руками.{/n} "Простите, я не могу сказать точнее. Мне все еще дурно от... пережитого".

"The pattern of their souls is disfigured. I recognise Kibellah's own hues, but it is as if those hues were added by a cruel, brutish hand. Two of them are mere forgeries, but... they seem to be unaware of it." {n}Black veins swell on Cassia's temples as she clutches her head with a groan.{/n} "Forgive me. I cannot be more specific. I am still feeling sick from my... tribulations."
languages.original_text: "Узор их душ изувечен — я узнаю в них присущие Кибелле оттенки, но они будто вписаны туда жестокой и грубой рукой. Две из них — подделки, но они... будто не понимают этого". {n}Черные вены вздуваются на висках Кассии, и она со стоном обхватывает голову руками.{/n} "Простите, я не могу сказать точнее. Мне все еще дурно от... пережитого".

traits.locale_text: "The pattern of their souls is disfigured. I recognise Kibellah's own hues, but it is as if those hues were added by a cruel, brutish hand. Two of them are mere forgeries, but... they seem to be unaware of it." {n}Black veins swell on Cassia's temples as she clutches her head with a groan.{/n} "Forgive me. I cannot be more specific. I am still feeling sick from my... tribulations."

"The pattern of their souls is disfigured. I recognise Kibellah's own hues, but they are distorted by foul flashes of agony, disgust, and horror. None of the three are her and yet any of them could be her...." {n}Black veins swell on Cassia's temples and she wraps her arms around her head with a groan.{/n} "Forgive me, I cannot be more specific. I am still feeling sick from my... tribulations."

languages.text: «Los patrones de sus almas están desfigurados. Reconozco los colores de Kibellah, pero es como si los hubiera añadido una mano bruta y cruel. Dos de ellas son meras falsificaciones, y, sin embargo... no parece que sean conscientes de ello». {n}Unas venas negras se hinchan en las sienes de Cassia, que se aferra la cabeza con un gemido.{/n} «Discúlpeme. No puedo ser más específica. Aún no me he recuperado de mis... tribulaciones».
languages.original_text: "The pattern of their souls is disfigured. I recognise Kibellah's own hues, but it is as if those hues were added by a cruel, brutish hand. Two of them are mere forgeries, but... they seem to be unaware of it." {n}Black veins swell on Cassia's temples as she clutches her head with a groan.{/n} "Forgive me. I cannot be more specific. I am still feeling sick from my... tribulations."

Dos de ellas son meras falsificaciones, y, sin embargo... no parece que sean conscientes de ello». {n}Unas venas negras se hinchan en las sienes de Cassia, que se aferra la cabeza con un gemido.{/n} «Discúlpeme. No puedo ser más específica. Aún no me he recuperado de mis... tribulaciones».

languages.text: 「彼らの魂ノパターンは狂っています。キベラさん自身の色合いはわかりますが、その色合いは、残酷で残忍な手によって付け足されたかのようです。そのうちの2つは単なる贋作ですが…彼らはそれに気づいていないようです」{n}カシアのこめかみに黒い血管が浮き上がり、うめき声を上げて頭を抱える。{/n} 「申し訳ございません。まだ気分が優れなくて…苦痛のせいで」
languages.original_text: "The pattern of their souls is disfigured. I recognise Kibellah's own hues, but it is as if those hues were added by a cruel, brutish hand. Two of them are mere forgeries, but... they seem to be unaware of it." {n}Black veins swell on Cassia's temples as she clutches her head with a groan.{/n} "Forgive me. I cannot be more specific. I am still feeling sick from my... tribulations."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの魂ノパターンは狂っています。キベラさん自身の色合いはわかりますが、その色合いは、残酷で残忍な手によって付け足されたかのようです。そのうちの2つは単なる贋作ですが…彼らはそれに気づいていないようです」{n}カシアのこめかみに黒い血管が浮き上がり、うめき声を上げて頭を抱える。{/n} 「申し訳ございません。まだ気分が優れなくて…苦痛のせいで」

languages.text: “她们的灵魂遭到了扭曲。尽管我还能辨认出绮贝菈本身的色彩，但那些色彩看起来像是被某只恐怖的巨手强行添加上去的。其中两个人是伪造的，但……她们似乎完全意识不到。”{n}卡西娅的太阳穴浮现出了紫黑色的血管。她紧紧地捂住头，呻吟着。{/n}“抱歉，我没办法说得更具体了。由于我承受的……磨难，我现在还是很不舒服。”
languages.original_text: "The pattern of their souls is disfigured. I recognise Kibellah's own hues, but it is as if those hues were added by a cruel, brutish hand. Two of them are mere forgeries, but... they seem to be unaware of it." {n}Black veins swell on Cassia's temples as she clutches her head with a groan.{/n} "Forgive me. I cannot be more specific. I am still feeling sick from my... tribulations."

traits.locale_text: “她们的灵魂遭到了扭曲。尽管我还能辨认出绮贝菈本身的色彩，但那些色彩看起来像是被某只恐怖的巨手强行添加上去的。其中两个人是伪造的，但……她们似乎完全意识不到。”{n}卡西娅的太阳穴浮现出了紫黑色的血管。她紧紧地捂住头，呻吟着。{/n}“抱歉，我没办法说得更具体了。由于我承受的……磨难，我现在还是很不舒服。”

languages.text: Das Muster ihrer Seelen ist entstellt. Ich erkenne Kibellahs eigene Töne, aber diese Töne scheinen von einer gleichsam brutalen wie grausamen Hand hinzugefügt worden zu sein. Zwei von ihnen sind bloße Fälschungen, aber ... das scheint ihnen nicht bewusst zu sein. {n}An Cassias Schläfen schwellen schwarze Venen an, als sie stöhnend den Kopf schüttelt.{/n} "Vergebt mir ... Genauer geht es nicht. Ich fühle mich immer noch krank nach meinen ... Strapazen."
languages.original_text: "The pattern of their souls is disfigured. I recognise Kibellah's own hues, but it is as if those hues were added by a cruel, brutish hand. Two of them are mere forgeries, but... they seem to be unaware of it." {n}Black veins swell on Cassia's temples as she clutches her head with a groan.{/n} "Forgive me. I cannot be more specific. I am still feeling sick from my... tribulations."

traits.locale_text: Das Muster ihrer Seelen ist entstellt. Ich erkenne Kibellahs eigene Töne, aber diese Töne scheinen von einer gleichsam brutalen wie grausamen Hand hinzugefügt worden zu sein. Zwei von ihnen sind bloße Fälschungen, aber ... das scheint ihnen nicht bewusst zu sein. {n}An Cassias Schläfen schwellen schwarze Venen an, als sie stöhnend den Kopf schüttelt.{/n} "Vergebt mir ... Genauer geht es nicht. Ich fühle mich immer noch krank nach meinen ... Strapazen."

languages.text: « La trame de leurs âmes est défigurée. Si je reconnais les teintes propres à Kibellah, c'est comme si elles avaient été ajoutées par une main brutale et cruelle. Deux d'entre elles ne sont que de vulgaires contrefaçons, mais... elles ne semblent pas en avoir conscience. » {n}Des veines noires gonflent sur les tempes de Cassia alors qu'elle se prend la tête à deux mains avec un grognement.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi. Je ne peux rien vous dire de plus. Je ne suis pas encore totalement remise de mes... tribulations. »
languages.original_text: "The pattern of their souls is disfigured. I recognise Kibellah's own hues, but it is as if those hues were added by a cruel, brutish hand. Two of them are mere forgeries, but... they seem to be unaware of it." {n}Black veins swell on Cassia's temples as she clutches her head with a groan.{/n} "Forgive me. I cannot be more specific. I am still feeling sick from my... tribulations."

Je ne peux rien vous dire de plus. Je ne suis pas encore totalement remise de mes... tribulations. »

languages.text: "Ruhlarındaki desenler biçimsiz. Kibellah'nın kendi tonlarını seçebiliyorum ama sanki bu tonlar, zalim ve vahşi bir el tarafından eklenmiş gibi. Bu ikisi yalnızca birer üretim ama... Bunun farkındalarmış gibi görünmüyor." {n}Şakaklarındaki siyah damarlar şişen Cassia, inleyerek başını kavrıyor.{/n} "Affedersin. Daha spesifik olamıyorum... Çalkantılarım nedeniyle kendimi hasta hissediyorum."
languages.original_text: "The pattern of their souls is disfigured. I recognise Kibellah's own hues, but it is as if those hues were added by a cruel, brutish hand. Two of them are mere forgeries, but... they seem to be unaware of it." {n}Black veins swell on Cassia's temples as she clutches her head with a groan.{/n} "Forgive me. I cannot be more specific. I am still feeling sick from my... tribulations."
